name: palecur
text: Good strip in a great arc -- would love to see Uncle Culpepper visit again.

name: red_rooster
text:
gotta love the hunch, "shruff" and "click".
badass.

name: catachresis
text: Props for reclaiming the kindly moustachioed southern gentleman archetype from KFC.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, Mangtastic, scrumpton, bug, robbingdog, nipsy43, LaserBlade, MrPoopytime, smilebuddha, Doc_Rostov, yingkaixing, morbo)

name: fosters
text: How dare you, sirrah! Why I assure you that this gentleman is the very essence of a fine Southern upbringing. That our proud heritage of genteel speech and prodigious duellery hath been usurped in the mind of the common man by the image of a gap-toothed yokel of low mind and poor breeding shouting at the unwed mater of his numerous and equally illbred offspring as they watch automobiles race in a circle is a matter most distressing.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, apocowarg, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, Mangtastic, fosters, bug, alzuna, morypcaina, robbingdog, NDCaesar, waldo913, Conn, 762, DougTheHead, gethen, dinner, nipsy43, aHatOfPig, LaserBlade, Wulvaine, MrPoopytime, eRiUukFJk, smilebuddha, Doc_Rostov, yingkaixing, toyoda, holly_golightly, stormagnet, pquinn87, libelandslander, tragicone, afvbs)

name: epicurus
text: And what better way to demonstrate one's good manners than by being an asshole!

text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. name: semiquaver
text: That's how Nixon felt, I'm sure.  Not to mention every openly racist or bigoted person in history.  Saying you don't care what other people think is just another way of saying you're a complete douchebag.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, divot, apocowarg, zcross00, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, Aaronb1215, Diggidy, Mangtastic, dismas, fosters, bug, alzuna, robbingdog, NDCaesar, 762, DougTheHead, gethen, dinner, nipsy43, aHatOfPig, LaserBlade, Wulvaine, MrPoopytime, smilebuddha, Doc_Rostov, spoids, NumberKillinger, stormagnet, pquinn87, gnjdfsgk, ouroboros, tragicone)

name: epicurus
text: Whooooah! Semiquaver, you'd better back off, this dude is the real deal! Not only is he a douchebag, he doesn't care that he is one ! That's like... TOTALLY badass. I think that's how Rambo would describe himself!

name: semiquaver
text: I'm going to basically completely stop thinking about soticoto.  Misanthropes deserve their disease.  *shudders*

name: fosters
text: He's not a misanthrope, he's just some dork on the internet cosplaying as one. Which still makes him ignore-worthy, just for completely different and noticeably sadder reasons.

name: semiquaver
text: You be right, sah.

text:
SotiCoti, you're doing this British = dickhead thing again.

Man, we talked about this.

name: laserblade
text: Chubby for "cosplaying".

text: Hi! Did you know you just described psychopathy? You might want to consult your doctor.

name: atticusonline
text: Man every time you post a comment you make yourself look all the more uneducated.

name: robbingdog
text: What?  Sorry, but this comment didn't really make any sense at all.  Are you just trying to annoy him or what?

name: ishuta
text: yeah do you consider yourself humble too

name: mugi
text: He prides himself on his humility.

name: smilebuddha
text: I'm easily the most humble and modest person I know.

name: invidious
text: Fantastic picture/comment synergy.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: Daaamn! Soticoto's answers could use some work!

name: fosters
text: So basically what you're trying to communicate here is that you didn't know something but are proud of yourself for it. Good to know the Brits have dumbass hillbillies too.

name: fosters
text: Be honest with yourself, you've never had a sensible conversation. And you're STILL trying to be funny. Still failing, too, although it's starting to seem like that goes without saying.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, howl, foolishsparrow, dinner, jezebel, MrPoopytime, smilebuddha, Doc_Rostov, pquinn87, tellumo)

name: rowboat
text:
When Soticoto speaks this way, what he really means is:

[IMGS OFF]

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Rowboat FTW.

name: achilleselbow
text: I am starting to get pretty distressed at the degree to which people on this board are completely retarded as regards understanding sarcasm, as illustrated by the ridiculous responses to this comment.

name: tekende
text: Based on the rest of soticoto's comments, see, I don't think that was sarcasm at all.

name: layzerblade
text: I think the issue here is that what he's saying is especially annoying if it's sarcasm, because that means he thinks it's witty .

name: dj_douche
text: Oh, Britain must be the world capital for dogging due to all the fine upbringing.

name: heccibiggs
text:
For kicks I read your entire comment out loud to myself in a Southern accent, which I rule at.

But I have to say the S's slightly like "sh", otherwise I feel I sound too much like a Southern Belle, and that's no good in this context.

name: crankheart
text: you...are my newest hero.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: So why is Colonel Dixie brandishing a German luger?

name: greyfield
text:
Thank you for, along with this strip, bolstering my armada of Southern diction.

Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to go demand my satisfaction from my roommate.

name: mnemon
text: Here Here!

name: internnumber1
text: Uncle Culpepper would fire on a child, just not a child of his own kin.

name: killerlimpet
text: If a child is being as sassy as Little Nephew can be, he ain't innocent by any standard

name: mastronaut
text: A Dixie whistlin' southerner would sure as hell fire upon a child that called him a yankee.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt, tttt2, Zem)

name: plusigot125
text: I'm hella envious of your ability to quote lengthy passages at will. Or maybe this talent only applies to lengthy passages from Achewood?

name: evolume
text: A comment left by evolume was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by alphagator, Deusoma, aHatOfPig, unsentletter, LRosetw8)

name: epicurus
text: Why can't it be both?

name: centipede_damascus
text: Reading this arc for the second time brings up interesting questions regarding the actual identity of the southern gentleman pictured here.

name: evolume
text: does Uncle Culpepper pack a Ruger MKII?

name: nicolae
text: You bet your sweet, savory ass he does.

name: geysershitdick
text: What's up Yankee Doodle.

name: jonnay
text: "Sir, your journey..." is one of the best lines in all of Achewood.  I commend Onstad's impeccable Californian understanding of Southern gentlemanhood.

name: baryonyx
text: Panels 4-5 are just oh so badass . It's such a shame Culpepper never met Cornelius.

name: mrklaw
text: Dueling must always be performed in the garb of the southern gentry.

name: hereward
text: If Culpepper regards LN as his 'kin', does that mean he is Ray's actual blood uncle? Or not? It all depends on southern manners. Anyway, obviously the exciting thing is that if he is, he is the brother of RODNEY, interesting.

name: mrklaw
text: he isn't. He's french southern gentry, like Rays mother.

name: ctrl_z
text: This is something all kids should learn.

name: atmus
text: So Uncle Culpepper and Little Nephew both shoot left-handed.  This is something I have in common with them.

name: tttt2
text: I was hoping 'pusillanimous' wouldn't have a real definition, and I could infer one

name: saddestking
text: I'm glad soticoto showed up to be a boring internet devil's-advocate in this comment page since apparently asherdan had commitments elsewhere

name: rowboat
text: Soticoto = Asherdan? You give Soticoto too much credit, sir.

name: jonmw
text: What really gets me is that he specifies "child of my own kin". I can only conclude that other people's kids are just smaller targets, and nobody is safe once over 21.

name: morypcaina
text: It is a "Forsooth! Bend Down and Observe Within Your Loins the Hand of Dixie" Friday.

name: irondave
text: Uncle Culpepper teaches him to shoot left-handed.  Maybe that's tradtional.

name: tothevictor10
text: shruff. that is the sounds coats make.

name: history
text: May your weekend be free of the hand of Dixie...but full of the hand of Trixie.

name: vulpes-aurum
text:
I just realized something:

Have you ever seen Uncle Culpepper and Cornelius Bear in the same place at the same time?

COINCIDENCE?

name: vulpes-aurum
text: NO.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
WELL...

MAYBE.
